0.0.17.en: Handle offline devices (e.g. no wifi or no power)

0.0.25.en: Added Core300s, Core400s, LV600S. Code Cleanup. Following updates may contain breaking changes.

0.0.26.en: Added Core300s, Core400s, LV600S. Code Cleanup. Following updates may contain breaking changes.

0.0.27.en: Added Core300s, Core400s, LV600S. Code Cleanup. Following updates may contain breaking changes.

0.0.30.en: Please re-add your devices if you have any issues. Using Sliders now for fan speed. Code improvements. Following updates may contain breaking changes.

0.1.0.en: First Release Candidate - Added support for Classic300s, Core300s, Core400s, Dual200s, LV600s.

0.1.1.en: First Release Candidate - Added support for Classic300s, Core300s, Core400s, Dual200s, LV600s.

0.1.2.en: Second Release Candidate - Added support for Classic300s, Core300s, Core400s, Dual200s, LV600s.

0.1.5.en: Switched API client to axios for better request stabillity

0.2.1.en: Fixed an issue with the Dual200s. Disabled adv. debugging

0.3.4.en: Added Support for LV131S, Added untested support for Oasis450s and Oasis1000s

0.4.0.en: Support for Levoit LV131, Oasis1000s, Classic200s. Experimental support for Vital 100s & 200s and Oasis450s

0.4.1.en: Bug fixes for flows and Oasis1000s

0.5.0.en: Added support for Levoit Smart Fan Tower (F422S)

1.0.0.en: Complete rewrite of the app for improved performance and easier future device support.

1.0.1.en: Complete rewrite of the app for improved performance and easier future device support. (Bug fixes #1)
